metadata.description: From the pages of TERROR TITANS and the minds of Justin Gray, Jimmy Palmiotti and Amanda Conner comes a new rock-slinging heroine! As Terra’s earthshaking stunts grab the attention of the world, a new threat rises from beneath the surface. Will Terra live to fight another day as she takes on the blaze and fury of Pyrite and the Lavarians? And what is the secret behind this new mover and shaker’s powers?
metadata.name: Terra , Vol. 1
